model

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Cell>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineGroup, TripletGroup

    public abstract class Group
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Cell>
    The abstract group class, which holds a set of Cells. It provides methods to manage the said set of Cells and check their validity.
    Since:
    Saturday March 9
